SEARCH
Package hms.entity.appointment

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
hms.entity.appointment.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
Represents a schedule for managing appointments with availability and timeslot tracking. Timeslots are 30-minute intervals, and the schedule supports custom and recurring availability.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Schedule()
    Constructs a schedule with default working hours: 08:00-12:00 and 13:00-17:00.
    Schedule(LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
    Constructs a schedule with a single range of working hours.
    Schedule(LocalTime startTime1, LocalTime endTime1, LocalTime startTime2, LocalTime endTime2)
    Constructs a schedule with two ranges of working hours.

  • Constructor Details

    • Schedule

      public Schedule(LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
      Constructs a schedule with a single range of working hours. Appointment array has a length of 48, each slot representing a timeslot of 30 minutes in a day
      Parameters:
      startTime - the start time of the working hours.
      endTime - the end time of the working hours.

    • Schedule

      public Schedule(LocalTime startTime1, LocalTime endTime1, LocalTime startTime2, LocalTime endTime2)
      Constructs a schedule with two ranges of working hours.
      Parameters:
      startTime1 - the start time of the first range of working hours.
      endTime1 - the end time of the first range of working hours.
      startTime2 - the start time of the second range of working hours.
      endTime2 - the end time of the second range of working hours.

    • Schedule

      public Schedule()
      Constructs a schedule with default working hours: 08:00-12:00 and 13:00-17:00.

  • Method Details

    • addAppointment

      public boolean addAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Adds an appointment to the schedule if it does not clash with existing appointments and the timeslot is available.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to add.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully added; false otherwise.

    • changeAppointment

      public boolean changeAppointment(Appointment appointment, LocalDateTime datetime)
      Changes the time and date of an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to change.
      datetime - the new date and time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the change was successful; false otherwise.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Cancels an existing appointment in the schedule.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to cancel.

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(LocalDate date, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
      Sets availability for a specific date and time range.
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which availability is being set.
      startTime - the start time of the available range.
      endTime - the end time of the available range.

    • setUnavailable

      public void setUnavailable(LocalDate date, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
      Marks specific time slots as unavailable for a specific date and time range.
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which timeslots are being marked unavailable.
      startTime - the start time of the unavailable range.
      endTime - the end time of the unavailable range.

    • isAvailable

      Checks if the specified appointment is available in the schedule.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to check.
      Returns:
      true if the timeslot is available; false otherwise.

      Returns:

      Checks if the specified appointment clashes with existing appointments in the schedule.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the appointment clashes; false otherwise.

      Returns:
      true if the datetime clashes; false otherwise.
